synopsis.text: Kaya, a young girl adorned with branches and leaves, is discovered by the occult investigator Ginko in the heart of a mountain. Shockingly, she is the mountain's lord, an unusual role for a human. As Ginko delves deeper into the mystery, he encounters Kaya's older brother, who has relentlessly searched for her since her disappearance during a storm. The tale unfolds as Kaya grapples with her dual identity, torn between her responsibilities as a Mushi lord and her longing for her human family. Join Ginko on his extraordinary journey to unravel the enigma surrounding Kaya and the mountain she calls home in this captivating anime adaptation of the final Mushishi manga arc.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
